name: find-website
title: Find Website
description: Quickly find the website you are looking for.
author: nahuel_andreoli

commands.name: find
commands.title: Find Website
commands.description: Quickly find the website you are looking for.

preferences.name: profile
preferences.title: Profile Directory
preferences.description: (Google Chrome only) Directory where your profile's data is saved.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
